column5: If you have a cabin booked at Merland Park this season you better call them ASAP to make sure.  Read my post in the sticky section for the QUINTE G2G
and that is reason number 8 why many people don't go back there hope every calls to confirm they res.
We don't want to go over reasons 1 to 7 again... lol

Never been out for a GTG...but they sound like fun. Someday hopefully.  However from things I have read on this Board from the past and now with this thread...NO WAY EVER...Merland's will ever see me.  I just can't bring myself to do business with such people.  Glad you found out when you did Lew & Phil.
Just tell them you're doing a TV show and need a cabin and a guide... they'll have room for you. Unfortunately then Joey and Paul may not have a reservation either...
HAHAHA... hummmm    (note: the  is not directed at Joey & Paul but you gave me an evil idea)  not going to do it though...

Perhaps the no night fire clause at Perfectvu is not so bad now.....  once again Merlands has shown their stripes....  I cannot wait to hear about the docking/mouse turd fiasco! LOL, it will bring back memories! Ones I wish to forget however...  G
Just found out tonight... We are allowed a night fire at PerfectVu, a group fire.. which is exactly what is needed..  G
A few pit's too G as I was the caller
What a joke, but I'm not surprised.
